post:
![](http://i.imgur.com/xRd4aGN.png)

##**Site link:** [English](http://kihihosting.com) - [中文](https://kihihosting.com/index?lang=cn)

**News**

* Updated control panel
* Beautification of the client area
* More statistics!
* More nodes.
* Android bug fixing / features update.

![](http://i.imgur.com/TqPpZmI.png)
![](http://i.imgur.com/JZ4NKb7.png)

**About**

* Canadian VPS Company. Located in Kitchener, Ontario
* KVM Virtualization
* [Android Wear & Android App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vps.kihi.panel)
* 100% custom control panel and back-end deployment / management. Coded using the libvirt API, Ruby and Go.

**Technical**

* **[Looking glass](http://lg.kihihosting.com)**
* Storage: RAID-5 HDD's
* CPU: 2.0 to 2.5Ghz
* Network: 100Mbps

![](https://kihihosting.com/blog/assets/img/thenetwork.png)

**Other**

* Who are you? See [here](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/33176/kihi-hosting-canadian-kvm-vps-hosting-custom-panel-android-app-starting-2-month#latest) and [here](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/29655/anyone-know-this-provider)
* [Terms of Service? What can I run?](http://kihihosting.com/tos)
* IPv6? Not yet. Soon however, just waiting for the network to catch-up.
* API Key for Android? Open a ticket with us after ordering!
* Transparency? Check out our [blog](http://kihihosting.com/blog) and our public [WhoIs](http://easywhois.com/)


**Low End Talk Offers**

**KVM 512MB RAM - $2 / Month** - [Order Here](http://kihihosting.com/pricing)

* RAM: 512MB
* CPU: 1 
* Storage: 120GB HDD
* Bandwidth: 500GB
* Network: 100Mbps
* IP: 1 IPv4

**KVM 1GB RAM- $4 / Month** - [Order Here](http://kihihosting.com/pricing)

* RAM: 1 GB
* CPU: 1 
* Storage: 120GB HDD
* Bandwidth: 1TB
* Network: 100Mbps
* IP: 1 IPv4

**GUARANTEE**
Unsatisfied? Contact us within 3 days of your purchase and we will refund you 100%. 

**Questions?** Questions about our network or monitoring system? Don't be afraid to ask!
